text: Akum'buusya (mmwe Muhammadi ﷺ) kuti ana ichichi yayili halaal kukwao (kulya)? Jilani: “Iwele halaal kukwenu (kulya) yambone (yosope), kwisa soni (nyama jammikuuli jajikamwilwe ni) inyama kapena ijuni yakusakulila yanyyijiganyisye kasakule ka ikwembelechesya, nkwijiganyaga (matala gakusakulila) gan'jiganyisye Allah, basi lyani yayinkamulile ni nllikolanjeje lina lya Allah pa ikwembelechesya, soni mun'jogopani Allah. Chisimu Allah ni Jwachitema nnope pakuwalanjila.”
